summary: In Santa Cruz for the summer, a young woman discovers the sport of surfing -- and a family secret as well.
cast: Aimee Teegarden|Patricia Richardson|Ben Milliken|Alicia Ziegler|David Thomas Jenkins|Lance Henriksen|Helen Slater|Bart Johnson|Wilmer Calderon|Brian Guest|Matthew Alan|Alexander Roos|Brie Gabrielle|Morgan Davis|Will Morales|Cesar Arambula|Richie Gaona|Sergio Garcia|Adam Pena|Omar Leyva|Rob F. Martinez|Joan Douglas|Hector Elias|Ashley Brinkman|Pasquale Cassalia|Jack Kaeding|Daniel Marson|Carlo Mendez|Tom Woodruff Jr.
title: Beautiful Wave
